ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with Karver.  I solod quite a bit in Great Divide on the South East side but since you have good giant faction, you cannot do that. Traks Tooth has
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with Karver.  I solod quite a bit in Great Divide on the South East side but since you have good giant faction, you cannot do that.  Traks Tooth has also been very good for me with lots of good loot also off the named.  Good luck

Lucifrina Sepulturra, 50 DE SK / Cazic Thule

Andy Phillips wrote:
Lower Guk, City of Mist, Burning Woods (incl. Sarnak fortress), Velks Lab,
the Hole (experience bonus there, probably outweighed by the difficulty of
CR)... none very exciting maybe, but good exp to get you to a higher level
(and then the planes should provide plenty of interest!).  BTW 45 went by
fast for me (LGuk), but man oh man the experience bar at 46 seems to be
stuck.

Don't know what works for soloing, never been that brave.   =)

Karver, 46.8 TSK / Cazic Thule


----- Original Message -----
From: <fluxion1@...>
To: <shadowknight@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 10, 2001 2:53 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Question


> Does anyone know of a good place for a 45 SK to hunt?  I just can't
> seem to find anywhere that is really intersting (or find a good grp
> there).  I tried Karnor's recently but that place is a mess (and you
> get bad Venril Sathir (sp) faction (the outpost in OT))  so that was
> no good.  Many of the higher levels are either overcrowded or there's
> just no-one there.  I solo a lot so I was wondering if anyone knew of
> anywhere good.  my Velious faction is with the giants (Ally, Warm and
> dumbarse Tormax still scowels, which would be nice to get some help
> w/).  I dunno, any ideas?  Have all my DF armor etc, so there a very
> few quests to do.
>
>
> Bored Ogre SK of Morell Thule
>
> Fluxurak
>
> Long live the Warlord Rallos Zek
> (I'm less evil, more into entropy and assisting it along =)
>
>
